nodes.text: Quellon was a male Chagrian living during the Cold War. He was a Captain of the light freighter Starrunner that belonged to a group of smuggling scavengers, who looted Yavin 4 a few years before 3642 BBY, removing the sarcophagus of Horak-mul from its grave and carrying it aboard the Starrunner. The ghost of the Sith Lord, however, took his revenge by driving the ship's crew insane and forcing the Starrunner to crash on Hoth, killing Quellon and everyone on board.
Quellon appears in hologram in Star Wars: The Old Republic during the Sith Inquisitor class mission on Hoth
